channel.title: Cheatsheets on KubeDaily
channel.description: Recent content in Cheatsheets on KubeDaily

item.description:
Comprehensive Kubectl Commands Cheatsheet

General Commands

Check kubectl version

kubectl version –client

Get cluster info

kubectl cluster-info

List all contexts in your kubeconfig file

kubectl config get-contexts

Set the current context

kubectl config use-context

View the current context

kubectl config current-context

View kubectl configuration

kubectl config view

List available API resources

kubectl api-resources

List supported API versions

kubectl api-versions

Explain a resource (e.g., pod)

kubectl explain pod

Get available resource types

kubectl api-resources
